## Snapshot
- **3M Electronics Material | 5 + years**: <br/>I worked as Marketing Analyst and Technical Product Manager for semiconductor products—worked with Sales, R&D, and Manufacturing to launch adhesive and packaging solutions.
- **M.S. Business Analytics | UC Irvine**: <br/>Focus in machine learning, statistics, and data storytelling. Held student-club leadership roles in **Product Club (VP Ops)** and **Women in Business (VP Comms)**.
